description:
The PaperAct Electronic Filing Cabinet (EFC) is a cloud solution for the storing, converting, organising, retrieving, sharing, viewing printing and communicating of all electronic documents (i.e. electronic files, emails, email attachments, faxes and paper based documents which it automatically converts to electronic format).

PaperAct (EFC) unites and integrates the traditional siloed, segmented and isolated filing solutions for paper based documents, electronic documents, emails, email attachments and faxes.

With the PaperAct Electronic Filing Cabinet, ALL your documents can now be added, organised, accessed and viewed in a centralised, secure, homogeneous,  intelligent electronic document store – Anywhere, Anytime using any Device connected to the internet.

The PaperAct Electronic Filing Cabinet Saves Time, Space and Money by tightly integrating your computing, peripheral and mobile devices with the Cloud, giving you complete access and control of ALL your documents and the information they contain.
